name: The Owls Perch Vancouver Islands Highest Treehouse

reviews.comments: La cabane dans les arbres d’Amanda est un véritable petit coin de paradis, parfaitement placé pour visiter la région (Victoria et les plages de la côte ouest) et extrêmement calme, je recommande vivement!

Ne faites pas la même erreur que moi .... ne restez pas qu’UNE SEULE nuit !
La cabane est sublime, la déco, les petites attentions,... un paradis !
We had a fabulous time. It was super cozy and there were lots of great recommendations for things to do nearby. Amanda was very responsive and we felt right at home.

localizedReview.comments: Nous avons passé un moment fabuleux. C'était super confortable et il y avait beaucoup de bonnes recommandations sur les choses à faire à proximité. Amanda a été très réactive et nous nous sommes sentis comme à la maison.

reviews.comments: It was an incredibly relaxing space. We felt so comfortable here, and we loved how unique it is. Lots of beautiful places to visit nearby as well.

localizedReview.comments: C'était un espace incroyablement relaxant. Nous nous sommes sentis si à l'aise ici, et nous avons adoré à quel point elle est unique. Beaucoup de beaux endroits à visiter à proximité également.

reviews.comments: Amanda's Owl Perch was a lovely place to spend our 20th-anniversary weekend!  It was cosy, clean, and beautiful.  One definitely needs to be ok with stairs and ladders.  Such a gorgeous peaceful little nest!  The area around it is great for adventuring - we went on lovely hikes to waterfalls, walks on gorgeous west coast beaches, and ate at several great cafés and restaurants.  We spent a day roaming around in Victoria, then scooted back to our quiet getaway.  An amazing place!!!

localizedReview.comments: Amanda 's Owl Perch était un bel endroit pour passer notre week-end de 20e anniversaire !  C'était confortable, propre et magnifique.  Il faut absolument être ok avec les escaliers et les échelles.  Un magnifique petit nid paisible !  La région autour est idéale pour l'aventure - nous avons fait de belles randonnées vers des cascades, des promenades sur de magnifiques plages de la côte ouest, et avons mangé dans plusieurs excellents cafés et restaurants.  Nous avons passé une journée à nous promener à Victoria, puis nous sommes retournés à notre escapade tranquille.  Un endroit incroyable ! ! !

reviews.comments: Very cute and cozy place for 2! Well taken care of and lots of thought put into setup to make this tiny home a fun place to stay.

localizedReview.comments: Endroit très mignon et confortable pour 2 personnes ! Bien pris en charge et beaucoup de réflexion mise en place pour faire de cette micro-maison un endroit agréable où séjourner.

reviews.comments:
The tree house was lovely! Very peaceful and relaxing.
Amanda was a great host, even left us a bottle of wine for my girlfriend’s birthday! Very thoughtful.
The house was very well done and it was spotless when we arrived.
We also enjoyed the east access to the Galloping Goose trail, just a couple steps from the driveway. We enjoyed our relaxing trip in Sooke and the Owl’s Perch treehouse was an amazing experience!

localizedReview.comments:
La cabane dans les arbres était adorable ! Très paisible et relaxant.
Amanda a été une hôte formidable, elle nous a même laissé une bouteille de vin pour l'anniversaire de ma petite amie ! Très attentionné.
La maison était très bien faite et c'était impeccable quand nous sommes arrivés.
Nous avons également apprécié l'accès est au sentier Galloping Goose, à quelques pas de l'allée. Nous avons apprécié notre voyage relaxant à Sooke et la cabane dans les arbres Owl 's Perch a été une expérience incroyable !

reviews.comments: Very tastefully done.  The combination of metal and wood was beautiful.

localizedReview.comments: Fait avec beaucoup de goût.  La combinaison du métal et du bois était magnifique.

reviews.comments: Sparkling clean. Attention to details. Very Quiet place but close to supermarket and restaurants, very convenient. Walking distance to beautiful trails. Must visit!

localizedReview.comments: Propreté impeccable. Attention aux détails. Endroit très calme mais proche du supermarché et des restaurants, très pratique. À distance de marche de beaux sentiers. À visiter absolument !

reviews.comments: Beautiful Treehouse and a proactive host made everything super easy. Highly Recommend.

localizedReview.comments: Belle cabane dans les arbres et un hôte proactif ont tout rendu super facile. Hautement recommandé.

primaryHost.about: Our family moved to Vancouver island with our daughter to be closer to nature. We chose Sooke because it’s where the rainforest meets the sea. We love hosting, traveling and exploring.

sectionedDescription.access: Guest will have private access and parking to the treehouse. They will have complete access to the treehouse and decks
sectionedDescription.description:
A truly unique treehouse perched 30 feet high among the trees. This amazing structure is attached to 3 large cedars and 1 giant maple using advanced tree tabs that allow the trees to sway gently, providing a natural and immersive experience. The large deck offers stunning views across the Salish Sea to the Mountains of Washington state. With all the modern amenities you could need, it's the perfect place to relax and unwind.  Experience the magic and wonder of treehouse living for yourself!

Inside, you'll find a cozy space equipped with a 3-piece bathroom, kitchenette, and comfortable living room complete with a love seat, dining table, and fireplace. The loft bedroom offers a plush queen bed and a large picture window, providing breathtaking views of the surrounding forest. For entertainment, Netflix is installed and ready to use, while a large private deck offers the perfect spot to relax and take in the beauty of the trees

Guest will have private access and parking to the treehouse. They will have complete access to the treehouse and decks

The treehouse is designed to allow guests to have their own space. It has a separate entrance to the property to allow for maximum privacy. We are happy to provide recommendations on places to visit during their trip and to provide fresh towels and linens when needed. Please ask about our treehouse massage services 🪷

The neighborhood is located on the Galloping Goose Trail, once a train track used by an old gold mining town. The treehouse is also near the Sooke Potholes Provincial Park, which offers freshwater swimming, waterfalls, wildlife, and pipe walks.

We are about 2km to the nearest bus stop and there are cab services in our area. There is also places to park and ride.

There are almost 50 steps to the canopy and there is a ladder to reach the loft bedroom. Be aware if you have any difficulty climbing. The kitchenette does not have a stove only a microwave and toaster oven. There is a BBQ/Grill. Netflix installed
sectionedDescription.interaction: The treehouse is designed to allow guests to have their own space. It has a separate entrance to the property to allow for maximum privacy. name: Leaning Tree Retreat - Cabin in the Woods

reviews.comments: Beautiful private quiet setting. Best Airbnb kitchen in years - all the pots and pans and dishes etc. - and very clean. Especially loved the rain shower, the bed and the propane fire pit. Very comfortable. Enjoyed our stay very much. Thank you!

localizedReview.comments: Magnifique cadre privé et calme Meilleure cuisine Airbnb depuis des années - toutes les casseroles, poêles et vaisselle, etc. - et très propre. J'ai particulièrement adoré la douche à effet de pluie, le lit et le foyer au propane. Très confortable. Nous avons grandement apprécié notre séjour. Merci !

reviews.comments: Such a peaceful cabin! Highly recommend for those looking to escape the city for a weekend. Really appreciated the dog treats and how dog friendly the space was.

localizedReview.comments: Un chalet paisible ! Hautement recommandé pour ceux qui souhaitent s'évader de la ville pour un week-end. J'ai vraiment apprécié les friandises pour chiens et la façon dont le logement était adapté aux chiens.

reviews.comments:
Scott and Lauren were great hosts. The cabin was so inviting and relaxing. we were able to bring our pups and they were gracious enough to leave us a bottle of wine as well as treats for the pups! they were super responsive with any questions we had and always ensured we had everything we needed.
The cabin was quiet and peaceful, we slept so well! There were so many great hiking trails nearby....we also brought our own kayaks. We had a blast!

localizedReview.comments:
Scott et Lauren ont été d'excellents hôtes. La cabane était si accueillante et relaxante. Nous avons pu amener nos chiots et ils ont eu la gentillesse de nous laisser une bouteille de vin ainsi que des friandises pour les chiots ! Ils ont été super réactifs avec toutes les questions que nous avions et ont toujours veillé à ce que nous ayons tout ce dont nous avions besoin.
La cabane était calme et paisible, nous avons tellement bien dormi ! Il y avait tellement de sentiers de randonnée à proximité...nous avons également apporté nos propres kayaks. On s'est éclatés !

reviews.comments: Beautifully decorated cozy cottage surrounded by trees,  it was a perfect base for our family of three.

localizedReview.comments: Chalet confortable joliment décoré entouré d'arbres,  c'était un point de départ idéal pour notre famille de trois.

reviews.comments: My husband and I really enjoy staying at Lauren and Scott's lovely cabin in the woods. It was peaceful and a really nice energy about the place. We loved the outdoor undercover area where we read, relaxed, did yoga, and meditated. The place looked even better than the photos. It was spotlessly clean (even in the corners and harder to reach places). It was very new and we enjoyed all the touches in how it was decorated. The kitchen was stocked so well that we didn't need anything extra. We cooked there several times and found the kitchen very functional and so well equipped. The bedroom and bathroom also had everything you could ever want. It was a very quiet area and we enjoyed hiking up to the top of the hill on their property to enjoy the beautiful views as well as hikes around the area. Lauren and Scott were very responsive and helpful. We would recommend their place highly as staying here was a highlight of our trip to the beautiful Sunshine Coast.

localizedReview.comments: Mon mari et moi avons vraiment apprécié de séjourner dans la charmante cabane de Lauren et Scott dans les bois. C'était paisible et c'était une très belle énergie dans l'endroit. Nous avons adoré l'espace couvert extérieur où nous avons lu, détendu, fait du yoga et médité. Le logement était encore mieux que les photos. Il était impeccablement propre (même dans les coins et plus difficile à atteindre). C'était très nouveau et nous avons apprécié l'ensemble des touches dans la façon dont il a été décoré. La cuisine était si bien approvisionnée que nous n'avions besoin de rien de plus. Nous y avons cuisiné plusieurs fois et avons trouvé la cuisine très fonctionnelle et si bien équipée La chambre et la salle de bain avaient également tout ce que vous pouviez désirer. C'était un quartier très calme et nous avons apprécié de faire de la randonnée jusqu'au sommet de la colline sur leur propriété pour profiter de la vue magnifique ainsi que des randonnées dans la région. Lauren et Scott ont été très réactifs et très serviables. Nous recommandons vivement leur logement car séjourner ici a été l'un des points forts de notre voyage vers la magnifique Sunshine Coast.

reviews.comments: Scott & Laurens place is truly a peaceful oasis. It was just the escape from the city that my pup and I needed to decompress. Scott and Lauren were such considerate and gracious hosts with great communication. The bed was SO comfortable and the kitchen & appliances were very modern and useful. The rainfall shower, bbq, and gas fire pit outside were also a huge plus, and my pup would definitely say the surrounding forest and explorable areas on the property were the best part! Truly a soothing and healing place.

localizedReview.comments: Scott & Laurens place est vraiment un havre de paix. C'était juste l'évasion de la ville que mon chiot et moi devions décompresser. Scott et Lauren ont été des hôtes très attentionnés et aimables. Le lit était très confortable et la cuisine et les appareils étaient très modernes et utiles. La douche à effet de pluie, le barbecue et le foyer à gaz à l'extérieur étaient également un énorme avantage, et mon chiot dirait que la forêt environnante et les zones explorables de la propriété étaient la meilleure partie ! Vraiment un lieu apaisant et curatif.

reviews.comments: We really enjoyed the cabin. It was so clean and comfortable. We appreciated the dog bowls towel and treats. The deck is amazing and we used the fire pit and bbq. Lovely and peaceful with many hikes and beaches nearby. Defiantly would want to stay again or recommend to others.

localizedReview.comments: Nous avons vraiment apprécié le chalet. C'était tellement propre et confortable. Nous avons apprécié les serviettes et les friandises pour chiens. La terrasse est incroyable et nous avons utilisé le brasero et le barbecue. Agréable et paisible avec de nombreuses randonnées et plages à proximité. Je souhaiterais y séjourner à nouveau ou recommander à d'autres personnes.

reviews.comments: Scott and Lauren were super responsive and friendly and we loved staying in this beautiful, clean, and well-designed space! It’s tucked away in the trees so the temperature was cool, even though it was really warm out! They also have a ceiling fan and additional fan in case it did get too warm. Loved all the decor details throughout and parking was easy since the driveway was nicely paved. We had everything we needed for our weekend get away with our pup!

localizedReview.comments: Scott et Lauren ont été super réactifs et sympathiques et nous avons adoré séjourner dans ce bel espace propre et bien conçu ! C'est caché dans les arbres, donc la température était fraîche, même s'il faisait vraiment chaud ! Ils disposent également d'un ventilateur de plafond et d'un ventilateur supplémentaire au cas où il ferait trop chaud. J'ai adoré tous les détails de la décoration et le stationnement était facile car l'allée était joliment pavée. Nous avons eu tout le nécessaire pour notre week-end, partez avec notre chiot !

reviews.comments: This was such a great trip. The cabin was great and I can't get over how beautiful and peaceful the Sunshine Coast is. Had my phone set on do not disturb and had a relaxing time.

localizedReview.comments: C'était un super voyage. La cabane était géniale et je n'arrive pas à comprendre à quel point la Sunshine Coast est belle et paisible. J'avais mon téléphone allumé, ne vous dérangez pas et j'ai passé un moment de détente.

reviews.comments: My boyfriend and I had a great time at Scott's place! It was quiet, cozy and the peaceful getaway we needed! Scott and Lauren were very responsive and helpful with everything we needed. I would 100% return!

localizedReview.comments: Mon petit ami et moi avons passé un très bon moment chez Scott ! C'était calme, confortable et l'escapade paisible dont nous avions besoin ! Scott et Lauren ont été très réactifs et serviables avec tout ce dont nous avions besoin. Je reviendrais à 100% !

photos.caption: A short walk to the top of the property to enjoy vast ocean views

primaryHost.about:
Hi we're Lauren and Scott :)

Recently transplanted from Vancouver and are settlers on the stolen territories of the Coast Salish and Shishalh Nations. We live on this magical 6 acre property in Halfmoon Bay with our fur baby Harper pursuing the art of slow living. We look forward to sharing our space with those who are seeking some respite in the forest!

sectionedDescription.access: 10 minute walk down the road leads you into the vast trail network of Sargeant Bay Provincial Park! A short drive to Sargeant Bay for an ocean dip or you can even make it a day trip and hike from the property! Lots to explore - tons of hiking and biking trails, golf course nearby, and many great coves and beaches to soak in while kayaking, canoeing, or SUP!
sectionedDescription.description:
Welcome to slow living in Halfmoon Bay! This cabin has peekaboo ocean views and is entirely self-contained. Located 10 minutes outside of Sechelt where there's an abundance of amenities, and yet it feels like a world away! Hiking trails at your doorstep and a beautiful covered deck for your morning yoga :) Come experience all that the Sunshine Coast has to offer while getting your rest and relaxation on this magical 6 acre property! Well behaved doggos are more than welcome, sorry, no cats!

The cabin has a queen sized memory foam bed in the bedroom, and a pullout couch in the living room. Enjoy the fully equipped kitchen with everything you need to whip up a delicious westcoast inspired meal! Relax on the covered patio and immerse yourself in nature!

10 minute walk down the road leads you into the vast trail network of Sargeant Bay Provincial Park! A short drive to Sargeant Bay for an ocean dip or you can even make it a day trip and hike from the property! Lots to explore - tons of hiking and biking trails, golf course nearby, and many great coves and beaches to soak in while kayaking, canoeing, or SUP!

My wife and I live on the property with our dog Harper who is friendly and may greet you with a loud bark - but will soon become your best friend if you want her to!

Leaning Tree Rd is a quiet, dead end road surrounded by trails.

We recommend having a car as it's easiest to get around and explore, however, there is a bus stop at the end of our street (Leaning Tree) that is a 5 minute walk to our property.

There are great restaurants and breweries nearby and there will be two empty growlers waiting for you to fill :) 
Please let us know if you plan on bringing a dog as we have a $35 pet fee per stay.
sectionedDescription.houseRules:
-Dogs only, please and thank you! If your dog has separation anxiety please do not leave it alone in the cabin.
-We are cannabis friendly but PLEASE no smoking inside, there will be an ashtray available on the patio. 
-NOT suitable for parties.

Une cabane paisible dans les bois avec tout le confort nécessaire et très bien aménagée.
Un vrai petit coin de paradis.
Le plus on recommande le lever du soleil sur le ponton privé vraiment magnifique
Amazing spot! Cannot wait to return to our little sanctuary in Ukie!

reviews.comments: We really enjoyed, we gonna back one day ✨

localizedReview.comments: Nous avons vraiment apprécié, nous reviendrons un jour ✨

reviews.comments: We loved this Airbnb! It’s even more beautiful in person than is able to be captured in photos. The house is situated in a rainforest a short walk from the water, and while it’s convenient to town it felt totally private. Everything was clean, communication was clear, and the bed was comfortable. I’ll be staying here again in the future for the perfect bathtub if nothing else!

localizedReview.comments: Nous avons adoré cet Airbnb ! C'est d'autant plus beau en personne que ce qui peut être capturé sur les photos. La maison est située dans une forêt tropicale, à quelques pas de l'eau, et bien qu'elle soit pratique pour se rendre en ville, elle était totalement privée. Tout était propre, la communication était claire et le lit était confortable et le lit était confortable. Je séjournerai à nouveau ici à l'avenir pour la baignoire parfaite si rien d'autre !

reviews.comments: Amazing! Every detail of the cabin thoughtfully curated for a serene stay in Ucluelet. The perfect intersection of comfort, functionality, & contemporary-design. This cabin expereinces like a 5-Star resort, nestled in the woods with a secluded, yet safe, feel. From the locally selected soaps and shower gels, to the outdoor shower, private dock, and picturesque views from large unobstructed windows, every aspect of this cabin is 10/10. I tip my cap to Urszula And Kamil. Thank you for creating this haven & for being fantastic hosts.

localizedReview.comments: Incroyable ! Chaque détail du chalet a été soigneusement sélectionné pour un séjour serein à Ucluelet. L'intersection parfaite de confort, de fonctionnalité et de design contemporain. Ce chalet offre un complexe hôtelier 5 étoiles, niché dans les bois avec une sensation d'isolement, mais sûre. Des savons et gels douche sélectionnés localement à la douche extérieure, au quai privé et aux vues pittoresques depuis de grandes fenêtres dégagées, chaque aspect de cette cabane est 10/10. Je donne un pourboire à Urszula et Kamil. Merci d'avoir créé ce havre de paix et d'être des hôtes fantastiques.

reviews.comments:
A beautifully designed cabin in a quiet, treed location. Magical pathway winds down to a waterfront deck - a peaceful place to enjoy morning coffee or wind down after a day of exploring.
Thank you Urszula and Kamil, everything was wonderful!

localizedReview.comments:
Une cabane magnifiquement conçue dans un endroit calme et arboré. Un sentier magique descend jusqu'à une terrasse au bord de l'eau, un endroit paisible pour profiter d'un café du matin ou pour se détendre après une journée d'exploration.
Merci Urszula et Kamil, tout était merveilleux !

reviews.comments: This was one of the best accommodations we stayed at. Both Urszula and Kamil were incredibly responsive and made the stay very smooth. We actually had the chance to meet Kamil in person - what a wonderful soul. We would 100% come back again!

localizedReview.comments: C'est un des meilleurs hébergements où nous avons séjourné. Urszula et Kamil ont tous deux été incroyablement réactifs et ont rendu le séjour très agréable. Nous avons eu la chance de rencontrer Kamil en personne - quelle âme merveilleuse. Nous reviendrons à 100% !

reviews.comments: Urszula and Kamil were the perfect hosts. The Peace Cabin was beautiful and they were so helpful when I needed advice around road closures/ferry times. Greatly appreciate how responsive and kind they were. I will be back for sure!

localizedReview.comments: Urszula et Kamil ont été les hôtes parfaits. Le Peace Cabin était magnifique et ils m'ont beaucoup aidé lorsque j'ai eu besoin de conseils sur les fermetures de routes/horaires de ferry. J'apprécie beaucoup leur réactivité et leur gentillesse. Je reviendrai à coup sûr !

photos.caption: Peace Cabin being tranquil in the evening. Main entry deck on the right, sitting deck on the left. Parking out front.
Main entry deck.
Bedroom one, queen size memory foam mattress, giant skylight overhead, room for luggage under the platform, several clothing shelves and hooks, lots of chill vibes. The bedrooms are identical.

Bedroom two, queen size memory foam mattress, giant skylight overhead, room for luggage under the platform, several clothing shelves and hooks, lots of chill vibes. The bedrooms are identical, as is the copy.
Bathroom with all the views, but only of trees and ocean, so you're safe. Pull down blind if you need it. Deeeeeeep soak tub. Separate shower. Skylight (again, yes there's a trend.)
Bathroom shower. There are showers, and there are SHOWERS. Stocked with organic body care products.
Bathroom. Cute. You can stretch out in here.
The business end of the bathroom. Mouse-ear globe lights. Again, cute.

The living, kitchen, and dining areas are all one room. That's the kitchen wall: built-in fridge/freezer, ceramic range, built-in dishwasher, good knives, granite. Lots of hidden extras. You won't mind standing at the sink with that view.
Kitchen, looking good.
Kitchen, looking great.
Dining zone, mounted pedestal table with granite. Use it for extra prep space while cooking or a games zone in the evening. Your choice. The couch end is the best call.
Dining table - pull over the extra bench to have seating all around. Lots of modular options. The couch seat remains the best call.
Built-in couch. It's hard to want to leave. Custom designed and made. Extra thick memory foam cushions. Pillows for pillow talk, or just comfort.
Mmmmm looks comfy.

Cozy reading corner with access to side sitting deck. Ultra-efficient Jotul gas stove to get you warm right away after a rainy hike - also looks pretty decent. Small curated book selection of our personal favourites. Owl watches overhead.

If you get up early in the morning (hard to do, beds are comfy) and it is clear outdoors (it is often cloudy) and you catch the sunrise, the living area floods with the most magical morning light. Main entry door is on the left. The main chill zone.
Outside sitting deck accessible from the living area. XXL window for them VIEWS.
Cozy Malm wood fireplace. Corten steel back panel (we made it). Deck windows have cedar shutters that close when it's colder or raining - gets real comfy.
Cedar shutters slide closed when it's cold or raining. Keeps the sitting deck pleasant, and private. That's a Tesla Gen 3 Wall Connector. EV's welcome! Bring the correct adapter for your vehicle.
That's a Tesla Gen 3 Wall Connector. EV's welcome! Bring the correct adapter for your vehicle. Exclusive for guests of the cabin.
The end of the main entry deck is a comfortable hot water outdoor shower. A true west coast treat. On the right is a drying rack for wet jackets or wetsuits, and a couple of hooks in front as well.
Hot water outdoor shower, private, lots of cedar everything, peekaboo views of trees. Stocked with organic body care products. A water hose is also available for rinsing off sand from the shower.
The portholes of the recharge capsules. Yes, they kind of looks like eyes on a face. We love it.
The magical trail down to the shoreline where you can walk down for some bird viewing or launch your SUP at high tide!
Sunset at Peace Cabin shoreline on Ucluelet Inlet.
The shoreline at low tide, with Kvarno Island on the right side.

If you were a bird directly above Peace Cabin, you'd see the whole of Ucluelet Inlet with Kavrno Island in front of you. It takes about 45 minutes to kayak or SUP around the island from Peace, as long as the tide is high and winds calm.
Bring your kayak or canoe and explore Ucluelet inlet. Keep an eye on the tide and wind!
We're out for a SUP or kayak most mornings in the summer, if the tide is high enough. Usually, 1hr before and after high tide is best. Peace Cabin forest is in the right of this photo.
Out for a rip around Kvarno Island as the sun comes up. Lots of seals and sea lions, tonnes of birdlife, and a bear if you're lucky!
Back to Peace Cabin forest after exploring the inlet by SUP. This is about 2hrs after high tide.
If you return after the tide has started to drop, expect a bit of a walk through the tidal flat.
A cloud layer tucks Peace Cabin and Ucluelet Inlet in for the night.

primaryHost.about: We value peace and relaxation, learning and travel, and wellness and integrity. We are waterbabies who love cats. We think the west coast of Vancouver Island is one of the most special places on earth. Welcome to Peace Cabin.

sectionedDescription.access: Our property extends the entire length of the gravel driveway. There is dedicated parking right at the cabin. You'll have access to the whole cabin. The garage area down the driveway is off-limits to guests. Please keep the driveway clear of cars - extra large parking space halfway up the driveway. There is one trail to the shoreline to look for wildlife and birds on the inlet!
sectionedDescription.description:
We value connection to nature above all else. Peace Cabin is private waterfront on Ucluelet inlet, on a large lot of old-growth trees. We designed it quite differently from other places you may have stayed-this is a capsule to recharge yourself from the busyness of your day-to-day life. 

You'll love the silence, the birdlife, proximity to coastal hiking trails, surf beaches, and National Park. Our waterfront is on a tidal inlet- bring your SUP, canoe or kayak! EVs welcome- Tesla Wall Connector.

Spend your valuable time relaxing in a forest. Walls are finished in warm birch, 13ft high ceilings with big windows to connect with the outdoors, and radiant poured concrete flooring throughout. Bedrooms are pods with 3 windows - a platform with a comfortable queen bed with luggage storage underneath and several shelves and hooks for clothes. Restful sleep is paramount. A large bathroom with a tree-high private view looks at nothing but ocean and forest. A long hallway full of clothing hooks connects to the main living area with a cozy fireplace, a full kitchen with durable granite, lots of functional space and built-ins, as well as a wrap-around couch. The living area has doors to a long entry deck as well as a spacious sitting side deck. The sitting deck features expansive views of the forest and inlet beyond, a gas grill, and a wood fireplace. Rolling cedar shutters keep the rain out and allow sunshine in. Lots of space for your water toys, SUPs, surfboards, kayak, or canoe, as well as a wetsuit drying area outside. Of course, there's a comfortable hot outdoor shower, fully stocked, to top off your stay after a day of exploring the hiking trails, or an afternoon in the surf.

Our property extends the entire length of the gravel driveway. There is dedicated parking right at the cabin. You'll have access to the whole cabin. The garage area down the driveway is off-limits to guests. Please keep the driveway clear of cars - extra large parking space halfway up the driveway. There is one trail to the shoreline to look for wildlife and birds on the inlet!

There is a good chance we will be away from the property, however we are able to answer any questions you may have, just contact us through Airbnb and we'll reply promptly. We have a small apartment attached to the garage, so you may see us driving by to get there. Please leave the driveway clear.

Our neighbourhood is located just outside of Ucluelet town. It is quiet, peaceful, and residential with lots of water and mountain views. It feels much calmer and more private than in town. We are the closest you can be to Pacific Rim National Park - a 10 minute drive to the closest beach, or a gentle 30 minute walk. It is a 5 minute drive to the heart of Ucluelet. We love where we are, it's the best of all worlds without the hustle and traffic of town. It's so quick to grab a bite or takeout in town, or head into the Park for a day of hiking or surfing!

To get to Ucluelet, you can drive, bike or walk. Driving into the heart of town takes 5 minutes. If you rent bikes, there is an amazing separated bike path you can use to get to town, it takes about 18 minutes one way on bikes. If you choose to walk to Ucluelet, it will be just about an hour each way. We have a very close walk to Pacific Rim National Park through a gorgeous trail that takes between 30-45 minutes to get there and ends at serene beaches. 

Surfing is just a 10-minute drive to Wickaninnish Beach, or 20 minutes to Long Beach. We've got lots more insider tips for you in the printed guidebook located inside the cabin!

To get to Tofino, it's about 30 minutes by car, which is about 15 minutes closer than in the heart of Ucluelet. If you choose to rent bikes, one way to Tofino takes under 2 hours again, on separated bike lanes through the National Park!

Although this cabin is a 5-minute drive to town, we are on a wooded lot that has forest creatures. Best not to leave kids unattended outside, especially because we're so close to water. The waterfront is a tidal inlet, so sometimes there is 1ft of water, sometimes there is seagrass. Also, no unattended food or snacks anywhere outside especially during grilling, truly. Bears have walked by within 15 feet of us, and we are diligent at keeping animals wild. Further to that, please no events or parties or noise. Thank you!

Please note: there is absolutely no commercial activity (photography, filming, instagramming for brands - we're looking at you influencers, although not strictly limited to those mentioned) permitted on the property without expressed written consent from us. Remember, this is private property, and you are invited to make personal memories, and make photos and videos for personal use. Enjoy your vacation and share it with your family and friends(!!), please nothing that earns money or perks from what we've built. Thanks for understanding.
sectionedDescription.houseRules:
No food, wrappers, coffee cups, empty plates, or garbage bags to be left outside any time. Birds or wildlife will be harmed if you do this - we are strict with this rule. Also, please no parties or events, it's a very peaceful location. 

Please keep the driveway clear of cars so we can access the garage. 

Upon arrival, please familiarize yourself with the printed Peace Cabin Guide Book located inside the cabin. It has tips for everything we could think of in regards to using the cabin, emergency situations, power outages, and things you may not be able to locate or figure out how to use. Please continue to reference this guide throughout your stay, we put lots of effort into creating a smooth and restful experience for you.

Please note: there is absolutely no commercial activity (photography, filming, instagramming for brands - we're looking at you influencers, although not strictly limited to those mentioned) permitted on the property without expressed written consent from us. Remember, this is private property, and you are invited to make personal memories, and make photos and videos for personal use. Enjoy your vacation and share it with your family and friends(!!), please nothing that earns money or perks from what we've built. Thanks for understanding.
sectionedDescription.interaction: There is a good chance we will be away from the property, however we are able to answer any questions you may have, just contact us through Airbnb and we'll reply promptly. We have a small apartment attached to the garage, so you may see us driving by to get there. Please leave the driveway clear.

amenities.description: Il y a une place de stationnement privée d'au moins 3,35 mètres de large. Ou alors il y a une place de stationnement publique prévue pour les personnes en situation de handicap avec une signalisation ou un marquage clair.
amenities.name: Stationnement acessible

amenities.description: La chambre est située au rez-de-chaussée ou accessible par un ascenseur ou une rampe, et il n'y a pas d'escalier, de marches ou de seuils de plus de 5 centimètres entre l'entrée des voyageurs et la chambre.
amenities.name: Accès de plain-pied

amenities.description: Il n'y a pas de marche ni d'obstacle pour entrer dans la douche. Les pas ou les rebords de la douche sont inférieurs à 2,54 centimètres de haut.
amenities.name: Douche de plain-pied

accessibilityModule.seeAllSummary: Cet hôte a modifié les équipements d'accessibilité de son logement. Les entrées larges mesurent au moins 81 cm.

highlights.message: Vous aurez tout le cabane rien que pour vous.
highlights.headline: Logement entier

highlights.message: Vous pouvez entrer dans les lieux grâce à une boîte à clé sécurisée.
highlights.headline: Arrivée autonome

highlights.message: Les Superhôtes sont des hôtes chevronnés qui ont reçu d'excellentes évaluations et qui s’engagent à offrir des séjours de qualité supérieure aux voyageurs.
highlights.headline: Urszula And Kamil est Superhôte

highlights.message: 100 % des voyageurs ont attribué 5 étoiles à l'emplacement.
highlights.headline: Excellent emplacement

listingExpectations.addedDetails: We are in an old-growth forest on a tidal inlet. Forest creatures of all sorts walk around here including bears, wolves, and cougars. This is simply a reality of the wildness and beauty of our neighborhood.
listingExpectations.title: Animaux dangereux sur la propriété

listingExpectations.addedDetails:
One step to enter the front door. 
Two steps to enter the side deck.
No stairs of any sorts inside.
listingExpectations.title: Le logement comprend des marches ou escaliers
Dépôt de garantie : si vous endommagez le logement, vous pourriez devoir payer jusqu'à 300$

listingExpectations.addedDetails: We have one security camera at the front door and one at the garage. The security cameras do not face any windows.
listingExpectations.title: Appareil de surveillance et/ou d'enregistrement sur la propriété
